author: cnbc.com
title: LRAD® Corporation Schedules Fiscal Second Quarter 2018 Financial Results Conference Call for Tuesday, May 15, 2018 at 4:30 p.m. ET
text:
San Diego, Calif., May 03, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- LRAD Corporation (NASDAQ: LRAD) , the global leader in long-range voice broadcast systems, advanced mass notification and distributed recipient solutions, today announced plans to release financial results for its fiscal second quarter ended March 31, 2018 after the market close on Tuesday, May 15, 2018. The Company will then host a conference call and webcast at 4:30 p.m. Eastern Time to discuss details and answer questions about its business and financial results.
The details of the call are as follows:
Date: Tuesday, May 15, 2018
Time: 4:30 p.m. Eastern Time (1:30 p.m. Pacific Time)
Toll-Free Dial-In Number: 888.390.3967
International Dial-In Number: 862.298.0702
Webcast link: https://www.webcaster4.com/Webcast/Page/1375/25722
Please dial-in five minutes prior to the start time and tell the operator you are calling in for the LRAD Fiscal Second Quarter 2018 Financial Results Call. If you have any difficulty connecting with the call, please contact Brian Harvey, Director, Investor Relations and Capital Markets, at 858.753.8974. Questions to management may be submitted before or during the call by emailing them to: investor@LRAD.com .
A replay of the call will be available approximately four hours after the conference call and remain available for 90 days at the above webcast link.
About LRAD Corporation
The Company's proprietary Long Range Acoustic Devices®, advanced ONE VOICE® mass notification systems, and innovative Genasys™ mass messaging solutions are designed to enable users to safely hail and warn, inform and direct, prevent misunderstandings, determine intent, establish large safety zones, resolve uncertain situations, and save lives. LRAD systems are in service in 72 countries around the world in diverse applications including mass notification and public address, fixed and mobile defense deployments, homeland, border, critical infrastructure, maritime, oil & gas and port security, public safety, law enforcement and emergency responder communications, asset protection, and wildlife control and preservation. For more information, please visit https://www.LRAD.com .
Company Contact E. Brian Harvey Director, Investor Relations and Capital Markets 858.753.8974 ebharvey@lrad.com
Source:LRAD Corporation
